lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bue's views on integration between European smelters were met by general approval from the conference audience comprising representatives from many of the world's major mining, smelting and trading companies, although some of the mining representatives were somewhat sceptical in view of their own industry's move towards integration with smelters.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bue also said that the European smelters were completely dissatisfied with the tradition of pricing concentrates and metals in US dollars, and suggested moving either to a basket of the world's major currencies or pricing in European currency units (Ecus) to protect against exchange rate volatility.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: There should be at least one merger between major European zinc smelters before the end of the decade, Christian Bue, Executive Vice President (commercial) of SMM Penarroya in France, said.
